chat.msg: Welcome!
go across the river to the left just under the rock with the tiger
I see a river and a rock with a tiger on it. Am I supposed to go to the left of the tiger, across the river?
yes you willgo below the rock and then straight up across the second river on top of the parrots head
Understood. I am now below the rock with the tiger. I will go straight up and cross the second river on top of the parrot's head. Am I going in the right direction?
yes you are, you will then go down between the parrot and elephant, and turn right towards the 2 light gray rocks and dark rock to the left of the frog
Got it. I will go down between the parrot and the elephant, then turn right towards the two light gray rocks and the dark rock to the left of the frog. Am I going in the right direction?
yes, when you're in front of the frog you will keep going right under the frog once you're past the frog you will do a u-turn and head straight to the alligator into the rock in front of it

Great, I have reached the frog. I will go right, passing under the frog. After that, I will do a U-turn and head straight to the crocodile and into the rock in front of it. Am I still on the right track?

yes you are, you will keep going under the elephant crossing the river via the two light gray rocks under the giraffe then cross the river straight into the middle of the snake then keep going right into the end

Okay, I will continue going under the elephant and cross the river using the two light gray rocks under the giraffe. Then I will cross the river again, going straight into the middle of the snake. Finally, I will keep going right until I reach the end. Am I almost there?
Yes, once you reach the treasure box you have arrived
Fantastic! I have reached the treasure box. I have arrived at the final destination. *Finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
Where do I start heading?
Start by heading west, towards the wooden bench. Describe what you see along the way.
I see the bench and then a pathway going south into the bridge
That's right! You're on the right track. Now, instead of going towards the bridge, make a U-turn to the left and cross the trail again. Let me know what you see next.
I see a small stand with flowers and an umbrella
Great job! Now, continue southwards, crossing over the wooden branch that's crossing the river. Let me know when you see a white dog and a red and white checkered picnic.
I crossed the river and I'm at the left side of the red and white checkered picnic
Perfect! Well done. Now, move towards the picnic mat and touch the bowl of berries. Once you've done that, continue walking to the west. Let me know what you come across next.
I touched the berries, if I turn west there's a log to cros the river and a deer laying down to the right as soon as I cross

Great job! You're almost there. Cross the log to the north and once you've crossed the river, avoid touching the green bush. Instead, circle around it from the right side. Once you've done that, you should see a florist stand. Let me know when you've reached the stand.
I'm at the stand
Fantastic! Now, turn left (west) and go below the stand. You will come across a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass the bridge to the west. Let me know what you see after the bridge.
I see another stand and 2 elder people to the south
Great job! You're doing awesome. Now, move a few steps south, between the two elderly people and another wooden branch. Let me know when you reach a green bush next to the end of the branch.
I reached it
Excellent! Now, change direction and go east, between the branch and the bush. Let me know what you see a few steps to the east.
I see a deer

Well done! You've successfully reached your final objective. Congratulations! You followed the correct path and found the brown young deer. Fantastic job navigating the map! Is there anything else you would like to do or explore in this map?

chat.msg: Welcome!
you will start in the entrance of the blue tent head south passing the left side of the bush you will see a dog
I see a blue tent in front of me. I am standing at the entrance of the tent. Heading south, I pass the left side of a bush. Can you give me any more instructions on which direction to go next?

you will go between the bush next to the dog without touching the rocks and head east between the dog and a grill you will see a fire pit which you will go over it and go south east between the fire pit and the green bush

I see the dog sitting next to a bush. I will go between the bush and the dog, making sure not to touch the rocks. Then, I will head east between the dog and a grill. Next, I see a fire pit, which I will go over, and then go southeast between the fire pit and a green bush. Can you please provide further instructions on what to do next?
you will see a couple of mushrooms once you pass them you will see a blue car make a u-turn heading west using the pathway and turn south following the pathway until you see a telescope

I have passed the mushrooms and now I see a blue car. I will make a U-turn and head west using the pathway. Then, I will turn south following the pathway until I see a telescope. What should I do after I reach the telescope?

when you reach the telescope turn west then south to go between the telescope and green bush until you reach the pathway then head west you will see a pathway of light gray rocks follow that until you reach the darker rocks then you have reached your destination

After reaching the telescope, I will turn west and then south, going between the telescope and a green bush until I reach the pathway. Then, I will head west and continue following the pathway. I will notice a pathway of light gray rocks, and I will follow that until I reach the darker rocks. Once I reach the darker rocks, I will have reached my destination. *finished* Is there anything else you would like me to do?

chat.msg: Welcome!
I'm ready
Great! Let's get started. Look around and describe what you see near you.
I see a palm tree to my left side
Good! Start by going under that palm tree and head towards the south-west. Let me know when you're there.
I reached a sog by the beach

Hmm, it seems like you might have taken the wrong path. Let me start again with clearer instructions. Begin by going under the palm tree to your left and then turn right to cross the second palm tree. Let me know when you've done that.
dog I'm sorry
No problem at all! Let's continue from where you are now. Can you see a third palm tree nearby?
yes to my north side
Great! Instead of going under that third palm tree, I want you to turn sharply to the left before reaching it. Then, start moving southward. Let me know when you've completed that step.
Ok I past the palm tree
Excellent! Now, as you continue southward, you should come across a brown puppy. Describe what you see when you get there.
I see the brown puppy and 2 rocks to the south of it
Perfect! Now, go slightly left of the brown puppy, and then turn right to head towards the south. Let me know once you've done that.
I did that I reached one of the rocks
Great job! Now, you'll need to make your way towards the water. Look for a big rock on your left (west) and a small rock on your right (east). Once you see them, let me know.
I see them
Awesome! Now, go between the big rock on your left and the small rock on your right, and continue until you reach the water. Let me know when you're standing by the water.
I'm right by the water
Perfect! Now, face the water and look for a large red crab. Once you spot it, turn right (west) and start walking along the big rock. Let me know when you've done that.
I'm by the end of the rock

Great progress! Now, as you continue westwards in the water, you'll come across a third, medium-sized rock. After passing it, you'll see a shark in the water. When you see the shark, make a sharp turn to the right. Let me know when you've made the turn.
I have made the turn

Fantastic! Now, you should be heading back towards the land. Cross between the medium rock and a blue-yellow-white ball, then continue moving north. Don't forget to describe what you see in your surroundings! Let me know when you're moving north.
I have passed the ball and I see a speaker north of me

Great job! Now, veer slightly left and start heading towards the north-west. As you do, you'll come across a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Make sure to go between them. Let me know when you've passed between the red tent and the larger speaker.
I passed both

Well done! Now, imagine you are circling around the red tent in an arc, and then continue moving south towards the sea. But don't go all the way to the water's edge. Just as you reach the shore, turn right (west) and go below a red kayak. Let me know when you've reached the red kayak.
I reached it

Great job! Now, turn 90 degrees to your right (north), and start moving along the kayak. Keep going until you reach a small green bush. This is your final objective. Let me know when you've reached the small green bush.

general_survey.answer: Yes, my parents/household speaks mostly Spanish since they are only able to understand really basic English.
general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: For me it has become a normal thing when this happens, sometimes when I do it myself I don't realize it its definitely something you get used to when interacting with other English/Spanish speakers.
general_survey.question: What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:

general_survey.answer: Due to living with only Spanish speaking parents and attending school in the U.S I was able to practice and become proficient on both with no issues.
